title: Global leading kiwi producing countries 2017
yAxis: Production volume in thousand metric tons
summary: This bar chart has 10 categories for the x axis representing Country, and a y axis representing Production volume in thousand metric tons.
The highest category is found at China_mainland where Production volume in thousand metric tons is 2024.6.
The lowest category is found at United_States_of_America where Production volume in thousand metric tons is 30.48.
gold: This statistic depicts the production volume of kiwis worldwide in 2017 , by leading country . According to the source , China was the main kiwi producer worldwide in 2017 , with production volume of some 2.02 million metric tons .
